summary.description:
Today, a bit warmer for the feels like temperature (up 2.0°C).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 124 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in the amount of wind (up 21 miles), dew point temperature (up 3.6°C), feels like temperature (up 2.0°C), and outside temperature (up 3.2°C) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; a mild and comfortable temperature is anticipated. Outside; temperatures should feel nicely warm. Also, neither too dry nor too humid and light winds will prevail. A few light raindrops may fall, cloud cover will be variable, overcast at times, and periods of sunshine are expected. Weather patterns to stay the same.
